message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product.  I know it would be very valuable to you, so I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $10,000, and I'm willing to walk away if that's not acceptable to you.
